page.title: 09THORNTON COLLEGE
page.content: {GROUNDS In the{grounds}there is_ a small{chapel}- people come here for the brass rubbings. a graveyard - consisting of 46 graves,buried here are the past teachers and their families. a statue of Mary - erected in memory of a mother's dead son. a sundial - donated to the Convent in rememberance of a pupil's five happy years at the Convent. a statue of Jesus,and many other such ornaments. Near the College is a river with a{weir.}This runs just by the College { grounds.}In the Summer,many people from the surrounding area come to swim in the river and to observe the scenery.
